snippet: SLOAN--Howard. The Officers, Directors and Shareholders of 510 Park Avenue mourn the passing of our longtime friend and neighbor, Howard Sloan. Howard served on our Board as Vice President for several years. He will be deeply missed. We extend our sincere condolences to his wife Barbara and his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SLOAN--Howard. The Officers, Directors and Shareholders of 510 Park Avenue mourn the passing of our longtime friend and neighbor, Howard Sloan. Howard served on our Board as Vice President for several years. He will be deeply missed. We extend our sincere condolences to his wife Barbara and his family. 1/3
